description.en:
0-4. DH!: Himorogi Hyakuyomegatari  

5-7. Tonari no Inma-san (Okusan) wa Warau (The Succubus (Lady) From Next Door Jeers)  
A mother leaves for a month long trip and leaves her son Motonobu in the care of the next door neighbor Asami. To Motonobu discovers Asami's real form which is a "Succubus".
